columns.text: Heavenly moments of amazing vacations are waiting for you and your loved ones at Cloud 9 which is nestled in the heart of the colorful volcanic rocks of the famous Caldera, just 400 m above the sea level.Only a few minutes away from the cosmopolitan capital of Santorini island, the two villas are fully equipped with all the facilities you ever dreamed of, offering comfort and satisfaction. These two luxurious villas feature a minimalistic modern decor, mixing high class facilities and breathtaking sea views. Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool. At Ariadne villa you may also choose among two heated swimming pools, one indoor and one outdoor plus a steam room that provides you with memorable moments of warmth.If you wish to step out of the ordinary in a magic world of lavishness, Cloud 9 suites are the place to awaken your senses, granting you with a wide range of amenities for an even sweeter accommodation!

items.title: Villa Ariadne
items.description: A refuge of privacy and serenity, this gracious villa combines elegant design and discreet charm.
items.excerpt: A refuge of privacy and serenity, this gracious villa combines elegant design and discreet charm.
items.amenities:
Suite’s Specifications

Type: Suite up to 2 guests with a private outdoor heated swimming pool and outdoor heated Jacuzzi / Indoor heated swimming pool with hydro massage jets and double in room rain shower system.

Living Space: 70 sq.m. / 753.47 sq.f.

Quantity: 1

View: Caldera/Sea View

Location: Upper level in Hotel’s main building

Bed: King size

Bathrooms: 1 bathroom with couple sized shower with glass cabin

 

Ariadne Villa Facilities & Services

  • Indoor heated swimming pool with hydro massage jets and double in room rain shower system.
  • Steam room with a selection of essential oils
  • Private outdoor heated fresh water swimming pool
  • Private outdoor heated Jacuzzi
  • Private sea view veranda (upper level) with sun loungers, chairs, table and parasol
  • Private sea view terrace (downstairs level) with table, chairs and parasol
  • One loft bedroom, with king size bed
  • Natural full latex mattresses 22cm height
  • Luxury cotton satin bed linens
  • Microfibers duvet
  • Pillow menu
  • Bathroom with a couple sized shower with glass cabin
  • Signature Bathroom amenities
  • Beauty care set upon arrival
  • Fluffy Bathrobes, slippers
  • Hairdryer and lady’s vanity unit
  • Pool and Beach towels in a beach bag to take
  • Oil room vaporizers with guest selected fragrances
  • Individually controlled Air condition – two units
  • Individually controlled Heating – two units
  • Secured windows and French door with sound/cool/heat proof double glass
  • Direct dial telephone
  • Safe Box
  • Working desk
  • Audio Visual includes: IPad, Free Wi-Fi internet access, Led TV 42″ 3D (2 TVs), Radio/Mp3 player, iPod charger & speakers/cell phone
  • Fully stocked Minibar with complimentary bottles of water
  • Coffee Machine
  • Twice daily maid service
  • Iron, ironing board
  • A-la-carte American Champagne breakfast served in your own balcony
  • Candlelight Dinners upon request
items.seo_description: Villa Ariadne has an indoor pool, hamam, private outdoor jacuzzi, outdoor plunge pool and breathtaking views. Book this villa today!

items.seo_description: The stylishly-decorated Villa Iokasti has a heated pool & jacuzzi. Santorini cave-style elegantly transformed. Stunning sea views. Book this suite now!

items.title: Good to Know:
items.description: Each suite is stylishly decorated while both possess a heated outdoor Jacuzzi and a heated swimming pool.

items.title: Villa Dakoronia
items.description: ‘Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani, facing the spectacular Caldera view. Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island. On the caldera path connecting Fira and Firostefani, this luxurious villa offers a truly wonderful holiday experience. Aesthetically supreme and lavishly decorated, designed with comfort and practicality in mind, Villa Dakoronia guarantees the optimal lodging for everyone seeking privacy, serenity and incomparable views to the infinite blue of the Aegean Sea, the fierce rock formations of the caldera and the emblematic volcano.
items.excerpt: Villa Dakoronia’ was recently renovated from an old theran villa and is situated on the top of the cliff ridge along the traditional caldera path between Fira and Firostefani.

amenities.item: An authentic accommodation in the heart of exquisite Imerovigli village Santorini island
Consisting of two suites and four double studios

tabs.title: Good To Know
tabs.description: Villa Dakoronia encompasses all special features composing luxury living in a privileged spot of the island.

items.title: White Harmony Suites Santorini
items.description: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori. IN A TRADITIONAL SETTLEMENT OF THE ISLAND, MEGALOCHORI, 4 BRAND NEW SUITES OFFER LUXURY AND COMFORTABLE ACCOMMODATION IN NATURE. They have been created with utmost respect to the environment, following the traditional Theran architecture with modern touches of supreme aesthetics. Bright colors are prevalent in decor, reflecting natural light bathing their interior. Two of them come with exterior Jacuzzi, while the rest have access to a private swimming pool. The luxurious amenities and the cordial services create the idyllic atmosphere and ensure the optimal holiday experience for you. White Harmony Suites is the ultimate destination of relaxation in santorini. Let us introduce you to unpretentious luxury’ splendidly combined with the island’s natural beauty and its unique character.
items.excerpt: White Harmony Suites is a newly built boutique hotel with only 5 Suites, in the beautiful traditional village of Megalochori

SEO.title: Cloud 9 | Aqua Vista Hotels
SEO.description: Aqua Vista Hotel's Cloud 9 are 2 ultra luxury villas in the picturesque village of Imerovigli, Santorini. Complete privacy & unsurpassed views await you!
